flawed_nl_solution:
Boys make up 100% - 60% = 70% of the total number of students.
The total number of students at the school is 300 / (70/100) = <<300/(70/100)=3000/7>>3000/7 students.
Since 60% of the students are female, there are (60/100) * 3000/7 = <<60/100*3000/7=1800/7>>1800/7 female students.
#### 1800/7

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 70. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
